Name: The Apple One
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare garnish of apple slice & mint leaf.
Review: Whiskey, elderflower and apple with a refreshing burst of citrus.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2008 by Vincenzo Marianella at Doheny, Los Angeles, USA. In an attempt to give this cocktail wider appeal and inspired by a comment (see below), in January 2021, we reduced the bourbon from 60ml to 45ml and added 30ml of soda.
Nutrition: One serving of The Apple One contains 179 calories
